metadata.title: CVE-2014-9380 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The dissector_cvs function in dissectors/ec_cvs.c in Ettercap 0.8.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via apacket containing only a CVS_LOGIN signature.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.1-3').
